ygData.subject: Probably nothing, but worth checking I think
ygData.msgSnippet: These will probably be nothing, but, if you got a few minutes, might be worth looking into. 1)  Most likely someone s checked into this already, but what about
ygData.messageBody:
These will probably be nothing, but, if you got a few minutes, might be
worth looking into.

1) Most likely someone's checked into this already, but what about the
gnomes in the mino caves? Gimbalstan DID go on an expedition into those
caves, after all...

2) I notices an oddity with the mills. If you touch (click on) the
rotating pillars inside the mills, they stop spinning. Any thoughts on
this?

Tinik
